IX.iii.1.B.2.
d
.
Part D Coverage
Medicare prescription drug coverage (Part D) is available to individuals who qualify for Medicare Part A or Part B.  Enrollment under Part D is voluntary and requires payment of a monthly premium.
Note
:  Part D monthly premiums are based, in part, on the income of the covered individual.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B - Social Security Administration (SSA) Benefits Program
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B
